name: Areesh Jabbar
summary: I am a full stack developer with a strong interest in artificial intelligence, system design, and cloud technologies. I enjoy building scalable backend systems and integrating AI models into real-world applications.
education: B.E. in Computer Science & Engineering, Sir M Visvesvaraya Institute of Technology (2025)

projects.name: Wall Segmentation using U-Net
projects.description: Built a deep learning-based system to segment walls from architectural blueprint images using a U-Net architecture.

projects.name: Question Paper Formatter
projects.description: Created an automated platform to format academic question papers efficiently.

projects.name: Drill Hip-Hop Beat Lab
projects.description: Developed an interactive web application for creating drill-style hip-hop beats.

experience: Hands-on experience building backend APIs using Node.js and Express.
Worked on integrating AI models into applications for computer vision tasks.
Experience deploying and containerizing applications using Docker.
Worked with cloud concepts related to scalable application deployment.
system_design: Understanding of REST API design principles.
Basic knowledge of low-level and high-level system design concepts.
Familiar with designing modular and scalable backend architectures.
problem_solving: Comfortable with debugging complex issues in backend and AI pipelines.
Strong foundation in data structures and algorithms.
Able to break down complex problems into smaller, solvable components.
availability: Open to internships and full-time roles
Interested in startup and product-based company environments
extra: I am also a music engineer and have mixed and mastered over 1,000 songs using professional DAWs such as Ableton Live and FL Studio.
